Description: Read and modify worksheets and data in Google Sheets.
Name: Google Sheets

Methods.Name: List New Rows
Methods.Description: Gets the values of new rows - (Will not work if rows are deleted from spreadsheet). Columns beyond A-Z must be added as custom fields. (example: [rows].AA, [rows].CR etc.)

Methods.Name: Append Rows (V2)
Methods.Description: Appends rows to the end of the spreadsheet. Columns beyond A-Z must be added as custom fields. (example: [].AA, [].CR etc.)

Methods.Name: List Rows
Methods.Description: List the  the cell values of the specified rows. Columns beyond A-Z must be added as custom fields. (example: [rows].AA, [rows].CR etc.)

Methods.Name: Replace Rows
Methods.Description: Replaces existing rows with new ones

Methods.Name: Append Rows
Methods.Description: Appends rows to the end of the spreadsheet. Columns beyond A-Z must be added as custom fields. (example: [].AA, [].CR etc.)

Methods.Name: Set Cell Value
Methods.Description: Sets the value of a cell

Methods.Name: Get Cell Value
Methods.Description: Gets the value of a cell

Methods.Name: Copy Sheet
Methods.Description: Copies a sheet from one speadsheet into another.

Methods.Name: List Spreadsheet Sheets
Methods.Description: Retrieves all of the sheets in a spreadsheet.

Methods.Name: Get Sheet Properties
Methods.Description: Retrieve details of a spreadsheet's name and dimensions (row/column count).

Methods.Name: Update Spreadsheet Properties
Methods.Description: Update the properties of a spreadsheet.

MetaTile: Google Sheets Integration - Sync Data to Google Sheets - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Automatically update your Google Sheets by integrating your business applications through Cyclr's automation workflows.
